title: Married Premier League stars 'joining in secret sex parties with escorts'
text:

Married Premier League stars are reportedly using escorts to regularly join secret sex parties in multi-million pound private mansions and yachts.

A report by Daily Star Online features claims from elite agency Cinderella Escorts that football players are regular customers.

Many of their bombshell girls are said to forge 'Sugar Daddy' and 'Sugar Baby' relationships with star names as they meet at exclusive luxury locations.

Members are required to prove a minimum net worth of £10m and pay a yearly membership fee of £30,000 to get invites to the kinky parties around the world.

VIP escorts can charge an eye-watering £2,000 per hour or demand monthly budgets of £30,000.

(Image: PA)

Israeli-born escort Ksenia described one of their craziest parties after a football club had won a huge game.

She told us: "Everyone was drunk and danced until 9 o’clock in the morning. The men all jumped into the pool with their clothes on and no matter where you looked women made out with the players.

“Often they are all very classic and all the ladies are in dress – but this day was crazy. At the end, there was a stack of champagne bottles at the exit - a total of 600 bottles were opened and sprayed around.”

Discussing one of her clients, a footballer from Europe, she added: “I have soccer players as customers who I often see at parties or who were referred to me as a Sugar Daddy.

(Image: Getty)

“I had a famous football player who likes to spoil my feet and likes to be financially exploited. He let me fly in on a private jet, paid for my shopping, massaged my feet after a long day…that was it.

“Maybe it made him feel good that women adore him and I played an arrogant diva. I feel sorry for them sometimes, it’s almost like they live in a golden cage.

“Most customers are very cautious because they are afraid people will talk.”

Another escort, Anna, 21, claimed a footballer was involved in one of her raunchiest parties.

“A soccer player wanted the three of us to use him alternatively as our toilet," she said.
description: Premier League players are said to be amongst the customers of elite agencies organising secret sex parties
